author: stoddard
msg: Reimplement ap_stat using native Windows calls. This is good for a 10% performance
boost serving a 500 byte static file.

author: stoddard
msg: Open files for sequential access. This is a file system cache optimization
for when files are accessed sequentially (a common case with Apache). This
does not prevent a file from being accessed randomly.

author: stoddard
msg: Add code to set the socket timeout. Correct some error return codes.
